dt: {bc}the quality or state of being {a_link|secure}: such as
{bc}freedom from the prospect of being laid off
{bc}something given, deposited, or pledged to make certain the fulfillment of an obligation
{bc}an instrument of investment in the form of a document (such as a stock certificate or bond) providing evidence of its ownership
{bc}measures taken to guard against espionage or sabotage, crime, attack, or escape
{bc}an organization or department whose task is security

shortdef: the quality or state of being secure: such as

dt: {bc}a blanket carried by a child as a protection against anxiety
{bc}a usually familiar object whose presence dispels anxiety

shortdef: a blanket carried by a child as a protection against anxiety
a usually familiar object whose presence dispels anxiety

dt: {bc}a permanent council of the United Nations with primary responsibility for maintaining peace and security

shortdef: a permanent council of the United Nations with primary responsibility for maintaining peace and security

dt: {bc}the rights that a creditor has in the personal property of a debtor that secures an obligation {bc}{sx|lien||}

shortdef: the rights that a creditor has in the personal property of a debtor that secures an obligation : lien

dt: {bc}an investigation for the purpose of seeing if someone can be trusted

dt.t: All government employees are subject to a {it}security check{/it}.

shortdef: an investigation for the purpose of seeing if someone can be trusted

dt: {bc}special permission given only to people who are approved to know or see secret things

dt.t: The documents are only available to people with {it}security clearance{/it} from the government.

shortdef: special permission given only to people who are approved to know or see secret things

dt: {bc}an amount of money that a renter pays when beginning to rent property (such as an apartment) and that can be used to pay for any damage that the renter causes to the property

shortdef: an amount of money that a renter pays when beginning to rent property (such as an apartment) and that can be used to pay for any damage that the renter causes to the property

dt: {bc}a person whose job is to guard a place (such as a store or museum) and make sure the people and things in it are not harmed

shortdef: a person whose job is to guard a place (such as a store or museum) and make sure the people and things in it are not harmed

dt: {bc}someone who could damage an organization by giving information to an enemy or competitor
{bc}someone or something that is a risk to safety

dt.t: Any package left unattended will be deemed a {it}security risk{/it}.

shortdef: someone who could damage an organization by giving information to an enemy or competitor
someone or something that is a risk to safety
